name: rest-rant
description: REST-Rant is an app where users can review restaurants. |Method | Path | Purpose| |------ |----- | -------| |GET    |/     |Home page| |GET    |/places|Places index page| |POST   |/places|Creates new place| |GET    |/places/new|Form page for creating a new place| |GET    |/places/:id|Details about a particular place| |PUT    |/places/:id|Update a particular place| |GET    |/places/:id/edit|Form page for editing an existing place| |DELETE |/places/:id|Delete a particular place| |POST   |/places/:id/rant|Create a rant (comment) about a particular place| |DELETE |/places/:id/rant/:rantId|Delete a rant (comment) about a particular place| |GET    |*      |404 page (matches any route not defined above)|# rest-rant
